title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: Institut Francais du Royaume-Uni
hours: M–F 09:00–23:00; Sa 10:00–23:00; Su depends on events
content: The first in a worldwide network of institutes to promote and present the best of French culture. The site includes a café-restaurant, a cinema showing French films, the largest French library in the UK and a French language centre, as well as running other events. Set in a Kensington block that also includes the French consulate and a French school.
